Import Module¶

The classes in this module provide functions for importing Satellite images

class Import.read_xml_rapideye.MetaData¶

A generic class for storing the remote sensing metadata information

class Import.read_xml_rapideye.MetaDataRapidEye¶

A class for importing and storing RapidEye Metadata

Methods

classmethod import_rapideye_metadata(o, filename)¶

Imports Metadata from Rapideye metadata XML File

Import RapidEye L1B images

class Import.fep_importL1B.ImportL1B¶

Class for importing RapidEye L1B images

Methods

classmethod ConvertFileName(infile, band)¶

Method to find the ntf file from the xml file

classmethod OrthoRectifyRaster(InRaster, OutRaster, InDEM)¶

RPC based orthorectification

Parameters:
  • InRaster (string) – Full path to the L1B ntf file
  • InDEM (string) – Full path to the DEM file
Returns:

Full path the orthorectified tif file
Return type:

string
classmethod ReadRaster(infile)¶

Read Raster into array

Parameters:InFile (string) – Full path to raster that should be imported
Returns:2D Array with pixel values
Return type:numpy2d Array
classmethod Reproject(inRaster, outRaster, EPSG)¶

Reprojects rasters using GDAL

The class method uses the GDAL wrap function to reporject raster files

Parameters:
  • inRaster – Full path to raster that should be reprojected
  • outRaster – Full path where reprojected raster is stored
  • EPSG (string) – EPSG Code of the target raster
